attributes.action: Ban applications on land that has had 5 or more failed planning applications
attributes.additional_details: To protect the separate identities of areas to prevent the coalescence of villages, landmarks, landscapes and greenfield areas. To support Boris Johnsons statement of "no more building on greenfield sites.
attributes.background: Protect greenfield sites and gaps between settlements to preserve areas of the countryside on our doorsteps and that are of special importance to the residents.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about certain planning applications, but it's not clear if you want the Government to create new restrictions on all types of planning application, or just applications of development of previously undeveloped land.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
